1.Title: Safe Household Saw
1.Description: While off-field, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <color=#2BAD00>0.45</color>/s. When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, the equipper's <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>3%</color>, stacking up to 15 times and lasting 1s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
